A Holiday Poem

‘Twas the Day Before Christmas
And all Through this place;
I was the only one working,
Except for what’s-her-face.

The office was empty
With no one to punch;
Shite, what would I eat?
Who would get me lunch?

And that’s it when it hit me,
Like I was a seer
Why was I working?
Fuck it, I’m outta here

Happy holidays, folks.

-Because I Can.

Quote of the Day

“Gentlemen, you had my curiousity. But now, you have my attention.”
-from Django Unchained (2012)
